table.name: RouteName
table.sureToRoute: Are you sure you want to {{statusText}}  {{routeId}}？
table.sureToDeleteRoute: Are you sure you want to delete the {{routeId}} ？

new.startWith: The name can be composed of  letters, numbers, and underscores, starting with /
new.firstRouteNot: Primary routing path cannot end with *
new.serverIpErr: Service address IP or port format is incorrect
new.exactMatch1: Exact match (/demo): The path must match exactly /demo
new.singlePath: SinglePath (/demo/*): Routing path can match a single path
new.multiPath: MultiPath (/demo/**): Routing path can match multi path
new.ifNoPre: If no prefix, the prefix in the routing path will be removed when the request is forwarded.
new.noSensitiveToDown: Do not pass the following sensitive headers to downstream services. If no sensitive headers are added, pass all headers to downstream services.

global.editConfScs: Modify the global sensitive Header successfully.
global.notPassFor: Global default config，do not pass the following sensitive headers to downstream services. If no sensitive headers are added, pass all headers to downstream services.
